question.text: I need money and weapons. Where can I get that?
question.negative_answer: Go to the dealer and do some work for him: \n He also buys artefacts paying good penny for them!

question.text: I'm new in the Zone. What should I beware of?
question.negative_answer: Do your best to avoid mutants, stay out of \n anomalies and don't come close to unknown stalkers,\n especially those in dark uniform.

question.text: Tell me about the Freedom clan?
question.negative_answer: They are anarchists and bandits, try avoiding \n them if possible!

question.text: What do you know about the Duty clan?
question.negative_answer: They hunt down mutants and not really \n interested in chasing newbies.
